# Data Import/Export Spec

Test fixture for cross-reference link validation.

## Purpose

This spec contains all required files with properly formed cross-reference links for testing:

- validate-spec.ps1 CROSS_REF_LINKS rule
- audit-spec.ps1 LINK_VALIDITY check

## Files

- [USER_STORIES.md](USER_STORIES.md) - User Stories
- [USE_CASES.md](USE_CASES.md) - Use Cases
- [FR.md](FR.md) - Functional Requirements
- [NFR.md](NFR.md) - Non-Functional Requirements
- [ACCEPTANCE_CRITERIA.md](ACCEPTANCE_CRITERIA.md) - Acceptance Criteria (EARS)
- [REQUIREMENTS.md](REQUIREMENTS.md) - Requirements Index
- [DESIGN.md](DESIGN.md) - Architecture
- [TASKS.md](TASKS.md) - Implementation Tasks
- [FILE_CHANGES.md](FILE_CHANGES.md) - File Changes
- [RESEARCH.md](RESEARCH.md) - Research
- [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) - Changelog
- [crossrefs-spec.feature](crossrefs-spec.feature) - BDD Scenarios
